entry.title: Dollar Bill Origami
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 1.99 â†’ å…è²» ï¼‰

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Dollar Origami teaches you to craft beautiful shapes using only a dollar bill. Fold bills to create a memorable cash gift, leave someone a very special tip, or to entertain your friends. A bill worth only dollar suddenly becomes a priceless artistic creation! All 20 origami designs include detailed, step-by-step instructions and high-quality photos of the finished product. Each type of origami fold is shown in a precise, visual guidebook included right in the app. TOP DOLLAR â€¢ 20 shapes including shirt, gondola, flower, heart, and more â€¢ High quality instructions, diagrams, and photos â€¢ Easy-to-use, polished user interface START FOLDING â€¢ Step-by-step instructions for each origami masterpiece â€¢ Folding guide and techniques included â€¢ Designed for beginner and intermediate origami enthusiasts Have questions or need some help? Contact us at info@oribot.com Website: http://oribot.com
